Hey, I’m Aarham!

I am a third year CS Student @ SFU, expecting to graduate in May 2025. I have a passion for problem solving and interest in building services that cater to the needs of many people. As a developer, I have honed skills in various technologies. Currently, I am particularly enjoying C# development within .NET, and have built programs using ASP.NET Core, WPF, and Blazor, as well as video games in Unity. I am also experienced in other technolgies, such as Python, C/C++, and Javascript React/React Native. Apart from building software, I enjoy classical music, basketball, and model designing in Blender!

Education

~ Simon Fraser University — Bachelor's Of Applied Science in Computing Science (2021-present) ~

⮞ CMPT 225: Data Structures and Algorithms

⮩ Studies designs of data structures, such as trees, heaps, hashsets, and sorting algorithms in C++

⮞ CMPT 276: Introduction to Software Engineering

⮩ Practiced AGILE methods and Git techniques while building a web application with a custom tech stack

⮞ CMPT 295: Intro to Computer Systems

⮩ Learned about pointers and addressing, RISC-V assembly, and processor design

⮞ CMPT 300: Operating Systems I

⮩ Studied file systems, multi-threaded programming, processes, and memory in C

⮞ CMPT 354: Database Systems I

⮩ Learned about theoretical models, particularly Entity-Relationships, and table querying using SQL
